wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
Irisie nsesa no a, nna tserɛ egye [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use Dwumadzi ho nhyehyɛɛ] to mu, na egye to mu fenenkyenemm dɛ yɛnda wo mboae edzi wɔ [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/deed.en CC BY-SA 4.0 License] na [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL]ase.
Egye to mu dɛ hyperlink anaa URL bi yɛ edzinbɔ a ɔboa wɔ Creative Commons license ase.
